verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Broken for me,
broken for you;
The body of Jesus Christ
is broken for us. x2

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
He offered his body,
he poured out his soul;
The body of Jesus
is broken for us.
Jesus was broken that we
might be whole.
The body of Jesus
is broken for us.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
O come to my table
and with me dine;
The body of Jesus
is broken for us.
Eat of my bread and
drink of my wine.
The body of Jesus
is broken for us.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
O this is my body
given for you;
The body of Jesus
is broken for us.
Eat it remembering
I died for you.
The body of Jesus
is broken for us.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
O this is my blood
I shed for you;
The body of Jesus
is broken for us.
For your forgiveness,
making you new.
The body of Jesus
is broken for us.
